story.text: For just a moment I will be your guide.
Please come with me and discover this hidden paradise.
Today, with you, I want to highlight the growing need for more communication between the trees and us, the humankind.
A few weeks ago, when I went running in the forest, I heard the voice of Jodorowsky.
And he asked me “Hey Joseph, what is the craziest thing you want to do in your life? I want you to do something crazy!”
